segments.text: Good afternoon , sir . Gan I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon , I want to pick up a new shaver since the old one has retired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which brand are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm still not sure . The type with top quality , I guess . Well , which one do you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you prefer imported ones or domestic ones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter much . If it has high quality and reasonable price , it will be OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about Flymo ? It's selling well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a warranty on it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . The warranty period is one year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If there's something wrong with it in a week , can I come back to change it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . But you must show us the receipt . If something comes up , we'll change it for you .
segments.speaker: S1
